Articles.Content: I've been wondering for a while if there is a mod that adds heat haze to jets or even enviroment (e.g. Kerbin's deserts or the surface of Moho)?

You mean convection currents? Exhaust contrails? Well for starters there a mod called HotRocketsfx iirc. Adds some nice exhaust effects. The update the dev is working on looks spectacular.

More fx mods would he nice in general though.
if your interested BhamutD is hard at work (i hope)
